name: Myth: The Fallen Lords
description:
Myth: The Fallen Lords is a strategy game developed by Bungie. It was originally released in 1997. Eidos Interactive published the game. Myth: The Fallen Lords has a Metascore of 91, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Myth: The Fallen Lords is available on PC.
Jason Jones produced the game. Martin O'Donnell, Marty O'Donnell, Mike Salvatori and Paul Heitsch scored the game.
